meanings.definition: Resembling a cherry in taste or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cherrylike flavor of the candy was sweet and fruity.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a cherrylike color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cherrylike cupcakes were so delicious, they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a cherrylike hue, casting a warm glow.
meanings.sent5: The cherrylike scent of the flowers filled the room with a pleasant aroma.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to a cherry.
meanings.sent1: The cherrylike texture of the fabric was smooth and soft.
meanings.sent2: His car had a cherrylike shine after he polished it.
meanings.sent3: The cherrylike cheeks of the baby made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a cherrylike melody, bright and cheerful.
meanings.sent5: The cherrylike skin of the apple was shiny and flawless.
